name: Anthelion Helicopters
about: Anthelion Helicopters, founded in 2014 by two experienced pilots, is a premier helicopter flight training school and tour company based in Long Beach, California. We offer comprehensive helicopter training programs, including private, instrument, commercial, and airline transport pilot licenses, as well as certified flight instructor ratings. Our FAA Part 141 approved school boasts a 100% safety record and a 100% pass rate, with highly experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities, including the only Guimbal G2 Cabri advanced trainer and an FAA accredited helicopter flight simulator in the Southern California area. We also provide helicopter tours, aerial photography, and charter services. Our commitment to safety, professionalism, and customer satisfaction makes us the ideal choice for aspiring helicopter pilots and those seeking unique aerial experiences. Join us to achieve your aviation goals in a supportive and expertly guided environment.
